text: TY to #FuturesForum + @ssrc_org for the opportunity to ask a Q on behalf of @MSF_canada  on actions needed to improve #COVID19 #vaccine access. Great responses from @GayleSmith @UKAMREnvoy @JoiaMukherjee @AmandaMcClella2 on need to put #equity at the ❤ of all pandemic response. https://t.co/FEjVyGe9nI
